description: A financial app that allows users to track their expenses and incomes. Users can add, edit, and delete transactions. The app also provides a summary of the user's financial status. I led the frontend and did basic backend

Arcade game that tracks your head to move the computer science student to dodge obstacles for productive breaks because most students spend over 90% of their day sitting down. We built a solution to help students take an active break to ensure they're physically engaged.
The iOS app lets users explore different regions of Vietnam and learn about the signature dishes in each area.
